item.title: South Korea Acts to Stabilize Forex Market as Won Weakens
item.description: The Bank of Korea and the government took more measures to ease pressure on the won after an unscheduled board meeting, intensifying support for Asia’s worst-performing currency.

item.title: Coty Sells Remaining 25.8% Stake in Haircare Brand Wella to KKR
item.description: Coty Inc. has sold its remaining stake in Wella to KKR & Co. for $750 million in cash and rights to certain future proceeds.

item.title: WH Smith Faces FCA Probe Over Accounting Error That Hit Shares
item.description: WH Smith Plc is under investigation by the UK’s Financial Conduct Authority over the accounting error in its North American business that triggered a stock slump and the resignation of its chief executive officer.

item.title: Peace Hopes Add to Valuation Question for Europe’s Defense Rally
item.description: A sharp fourth-quarter pullback in Europe’s defense stocks has shone a spotlight on the shifting narrative for what’s been a key driver of the region’s equities rally this year.

item.title: BOJ’s Hike Seen as Net Plus of $5 Billion for Japan Households
item.description: The Bank of Japan’s interest-rate hike to a three-decade high of 0.75% is likely a net positive for households — to the tune of about ¥800 billion ($5 billion) a year, according to Mizuho Research & Technologies Ltd.’s senior economist.

item.title: GLP Is Said to Pick Investment Banks for 2026 Hong Kong IPO
item.description: Investment firm GLP Pte has selected banks for a Hong Kong initial public offering that may take place as soon as the first half of 2026, according to people familiar with the situation.

item.title: UK Deficit Falls in First Public Finances Data Since Budget
item.description: UK government borrowing fell in November as the economy continued to generate healthy tax receipts and debt costs declined, a modest boost for Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves weeks after she unveiled a difficult budget.

item.title: UK Retail Sales Fell Again on Tax Fears Before Labour Budget
item.description: UK retail sales fell for a second straight month in November, adding to evidence that the economy was damaged by uncertainty in the run-up to Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ budget.

item.title: 法国银行上调经济增长预测，经济抵御动荡
item.description: 法国央行上调了经济增长预期，因为这个欧元区第二大经济体显示出了对长期政治动荡和财政不确定性的抵御能力。【原文：The Bank of France raised its growth forecasts as the euro area’s second-largest economy shows resilience to prolonged political turbulence and fiscal uncertainty.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数将下跌，收窄周涨幅
欧洲央行行长穆勒称现在断言利率下一步走向为时尚早
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员马迪斯-穆勒说，现在说借贷成本下一步可能走向何方还为时过早。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Madis Muller said it’s too soon to say where borrowing costs may go next.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织认为，随着巴里克交易提高黄金产量，马里 2026 年将出现反弹
item.description: 在马里政府解决了与巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp.【原文：The International Monetary Fund expects a gradual recovery in Mali’s economy next year on higher mining output, after the government resolved a two-year dispute with Barrick Mining Corp.】

item.title: 击败 99% 同行的欧元区基金称汽车是新银行
item.description: 一位正在抛售银行业长期赢家股票的投资者认为，欧洲汽车股在多年落后之后有望取得优异表现。【原文：European auto stocks are primed for outperformance after years of lagging, according to a market-beating investor who’s selling long-time winners in the banking sector.】

item.title: 据说 KKR 将成为收购日本大洋公司的领跑者
item.description: 据知情人士透露，KKR & Co.已成为收购日本化学品制造商大洋控股株式会社（Taiyo Holdings Co.【原文：KKR & Co. has emerged as the frontrunner to acquire Japanese chemical manufacturer Taiyo Holdings Co., people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 廉价天然气的回归并未解决欧洲的工业危机
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格已跌至俄罗斯入侵乌克兰以来的最低水平。这对欧洲大陆遭受重创的制造商来说应该是一剂强心剂，但可能来得太晚了。【原文：Natural gas prices in Europe have fallen close to levels not seen since Russia’s invasion of Ukraine. That should be a tonic for the continent’s battered manufacturers, but may be coming too late.】

item.title: 据说 Coty 将向 KKR 出售 Wella 剩余的 25.8% 股份
item.description: Coty Inc. 将以 7.5 亿美元的价格向 KKR & Co. 出售其在 Wella 的剩余股份，并有权分享该美发品牌未来出售或首次公开募股的收益。【原文：Coty Inc. is selling the remainder of its stake in Wella to KKR & Co. for $750 million and the right to a share of future proceeds from a sale or initial public offering of the haircare brand.】

item.title: 马来西亚出口增长放缓，与美国的贸易额下降
item.description: 马来西亚 11 月份的出口增长速度低于预期，原因是较高的关税拖累了这个东南亚国家与美国的贸易。【原文：Malaysia’s exports grew slower than expected in November, as higher tariffs weighed on the Southeast Asian nation’s trade with the US.】

item.title: 阿达尼机场部门将投资 110 亿美元，寻求首次公开募股前的合作伙伴
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）集团的一位高层管理人员表示，该集团计划到 2030 年在机场业务上投资超过 110 亿美元，以竞标近十个新航站楼、升级基础设施并拓展飞机维修业务。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani’s group plans to invest more than $11 billion in its airports business by 2030, as it seeks to bid for nearly a dozen new terminals, upgrade infrastructure and expand into aircraft maintenance, a top executive said.】

item.title: 据说双威医疗将在 1 月份评估马来西亚首次公开募股的兴趣
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，马来西亚双威医疗控股有限公司（Sunway Healthcare Holdings Bhd）最快将于 1 月份开始评估投资者对首次公开募股的兴趣，此次募股可能会筹集约 7 亿美元资金。【原文：Malaysia’s Sunway Healthcare Holdings Bhd. will start gauging investor interest as soon as January for an initial public offering that may raise around $700 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 维斯塔斯 2025 年订单增长 74%，政策担忧缓解
item.description: 1 月份，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的回归和他的反可再生能源政策对维斯塔斯风能系统公司（Vestas Wind Systems A/S）来说并不乐观。【原文：Things weren’t looking good for Vestas Wind Systems A/S in January, with the return of Donald Trump and his anti-renewables policies after an already difficult stretch for the turbine maker.】

item.title: 印度大刀阔斧的金融改革瞄准外国资金浪潮
item.description: 印度期待已久的一揽子金融服务改革正在为外国资本涌入这个世界上增长最快的主要经济体创造条件。【原文：India’s long-awaited package of financial services reforms is setting the stage for a surge of foreign capital into the world’s fastest-growing major economy.】

item.title: 日本 10 年期债券收益率自 2006 年以来首次达到 2
item.description: 在日本央行将基准利率提高到 30 年来的最高点后，日本 10 年期国债收益率自 2006 年以来首次达到 2% 的里程碑。【原文：Japan’s 10-year government bond yield hit the 2% milestone for the first time since 2006 after the Bank of Japan raised its benchmark interest rate to the highest in 30 years.】

item.title: 分析师称日本央行未来加息前景不明日元走软
item.description: 分析师表示，在日本央行未就未来收紧货币政策的时机提供明确指导后，日元兑美元走软。虽然日本央行一如预期将基准利率上调至 1995 年以来的最高水平，但投资者现在将把目光转向日本央行行长上田一夫周五晚些时候的新闻发布会。【原文：The yen weakened against the dollar after the Bank of Japan offered no clear guidance on the timing of future monetary tightening, analysts said. While the central bank raised its benchmark interest rate to its highest level since 1995 as expected, investors will now turn to Governor Kazuo Ueda’s press conference later Friday.】

item.title: 中国 A500 ETF 资金流入量临近年底飙升至历史新高
item.description: 周四，一组追踪中证 A500 指数的交易所交易基金的资金流入量飙升至新纪录，强劲的资金活动令交易员们感到困惑。【原文：Inflows to a group of exchange-traded funds tracking the CSI A500 Index surged to a fresh record on Thursday, with the strong activity leaving traders perplexed.】

item.title: 日元跌势扩大，日本 10 年期国债收益率创 2006 年以来新高
item.description: 日本央行将基准利率上调 25 个基点后，日元兑美元的跌幅扩大。10 年期日本国债收益率升至 2.0%，为 2006 年以来最高。【原文：The yen extended losses against the dollar after the Bank of Japan raised its benchmark interest rate by 25 basis points. The 10-year Japanese government bond yield rose to 2.0%, the highest since 2006.】

item.title: 印尼发出削减矿山产量信号后，镍延续反弹势头
item.description: 镍连续第三天走高，延续了从八个月低点反弹的势头，原因是头号生产国印度尼西亚的供应有望减少。【原文：Nickel advanced for a third day, extending its rebound from an eight-month low on the prospect of reduced supply from top producer Indonesia.】

item.title: 日本央行将基准利率上调至 1995 年以来最高水平
item.description: 日本央行将基准利率上调至 30 年来的最高点，这表明日本央行对实现其十多年来一直追求的稳定通胀目标的信心与日俱增。【原文：The Bank of Japan raised its benchmark interest rate to the highest in 30 years, in a sign of growing conviction that it can attain the stable inflation target it has pursued for more than a decade.】

item.title: 中国焦煤将创八月以来最大单周涨幅
item.description: 中国焦煤期货创下自 8 月份以来的最大单周涨幅，受市场情绪推动，铁矿石和钢材价格也随之上涨。【原文：Chinese coking coal futures headed for their biggest weekly gain since August, in a sentiment-driven rally that also helped lift iron ore and steel prices.】

item.title: 俄罗斯准备在明年增税前适度降息
item.description: 俄罗斯央行将连续第二次将其关键利率下调半个百分点，在即将到来的增税是否会刺激通胀的不确定性下，这对放缓的经济只能提供有限的缓解。【原文：The Bank of Russia is set to make a second straight half percentage-point cut to its key interest rate, offering only limited relief to the slowing economy amid uncertainty over whether an upcoming tax hike could stoke inflation.】

item.title: ICICI Prudential AMC 交易首秀为其他准备 IPO 的基金公司奠定基调
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】
